# Online shop with react cart (React JS)

<a href="https://Grione.github.io/shop-app" target="_blank">Check The Live Demo</a>

![App screenshot](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/35578611/345371165-9488c709-4213-4b83-b646-7612f39b5dd1.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..Rv9celhcKc5ZiyTGy2gqRji2cCv7Qbfj6P97Dmgyz9E)

## Description

This application is an emulation of an online store. You can add items to the cart and place an order. There is a test web service on the project (Node.js)

## Stack
- React JS
- HTML5
- CSS

## Features
- Add items to the cart
- Change quantity
- Place order
- Save orders on a local server

## How to run locally
- install dependencies on the root folder
``` npm install ```
- also you need to install dependencies on the 'backend' folder
  ``` cd /backend/ ```
  ``` npm install ```
  after that you should to start node js server
  ``` node app.js ```
- also start the project on the root folder
``` npm start dev ```
